serena.description: Provides semantic code analysis and intelligent editing capabilities for codebases. Enables symbol-based navigation, refactoring, and code understanding. Needed when working with large codebases that require precise code modifications, symbol searches, or understanding code relationships without reading entire files.

context7.description: Retrieves up-to-date documentation and code examples for libraries and frameworks. Used for looking up API references, usage patterns, and best practices. Needed when working with external libraries, learning new APIs, or verifying current library behavior and syntax.
